description: This fast version of spaghetti and meatballs with red gravy is ready in less than 30 minutes, but you’ll be chopping, stirring and monitoring heat — actively working — from start to finish You’ll be busy, but not frantic, and rewarded not only with the twirling of pasta in half an hour, but with the satisfaction that you made every second count.
title: Spaghetti and Drop Meatballs With Tomato Sauce
title_page: Spaghetti and Drop Meatballs With Tomato Sauce Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This fast version of spaghetti and meatballs with red gravy is ready in less than 30 minutes, but you’ll be chopping, stirring and monitoring heat — actively working — from start to finish. You’ll be busy, but not frantic, and rewarded not only with the twirling of pasta in half an hour, but with the satisfaction that you made every second count.
Featured in: When Cooking, Invest Time. Or Work. Not Both..
